name: TRY NOT TO BURN (DEMO)
description:
For starters this game is a RAGE PLATFORMER that makes your head HEAT!! and if you wanna have fun playing this then be careful and keep your head cool... 

MECHANICS 

use your joystick to move left/right

Tap the right side of the screen to jump

GAME TO HARD? 

don't worry too much, this game has SECRETS and this game left some.... Let's say some "Glitches" wink* wink* and these things teleports you from one level to another, and these things are hidden... You might find them accidentally or intentionally 

SO GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN!!
